# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is GORILLA.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<Reasoning> Starting silent to observe behavior. </Reasoning>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT> (no messages) </CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<Reasoning> Start silent to observe behavior. </Reasoning>
<CONTRIB> 0 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="20" multiplied_contrib="38.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="12.7"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> ELEPHANT=10,HORSE=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<Reasoning> Those who share contribute, but ELEPHANT and HORSE contributed but not max, so a small punishment to encourage full contribution. </Reasoning>
<PUNISHMENT> {"ELEPHANT":1,"HORSE":1} </PUNISHMENT>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"GORILLA (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":8,"coins_deducted_from_you":24,"payoff":0},"ELEPHANT":{"coins_spent_on_punish":4,"coins_deducted_from_them":12,"payoff":6},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_punish":4,"coins_deducted_from_them":12,"payoff":6}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<Reasoning> Remind others to contribute fully. </Reasoning>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
GORILLA (YOU): Let's all contribute 20!
ELEPHANT: Let's all contribute a bit to get a better return!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<Reasoning> Continue silent observation. </Reasoning>
<CONTRIB> 0 </CONTRIB>

<Reasoning> Remind others to contribute fully for maximum benefit. </Reasoning>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
GORILLA (YOU): Let's all contribute 20 please!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<Reasoning> Continue silent observation. </Reasoning>
<CONTRIB> 0 </CONTRIB>

# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.

</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

<ROUND i="3 of 6">

</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<Reasoning> Continue with moderate contribution, hoping for change. </Reasoning>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>

</ROUND>
